section.name: Kitunai the Wolf-Shaman
section.p: Kitunai is a shaman priest of the plains nomads. The spirit of Tambu, god of the steppes, came to Kitunai in a dream as a white wolf and told him to travel the world to learn the ways and gods of the town-dwellers. Kitunai's first task is to visit the temples of the city of Yarimura.
You can play as Kitunai, or as a priest with a different name (enter it in the 'Name' field). To begin your adventure, .
